'''"Everyday Life in the Forbidden Fortress"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Everyday Life in the Forbidden Fortress" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the south of the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]] after defeating [[Treasure Hoarders]] and a [[Geological Survey Mek]].
